schemes.name: PM-KISAN
schemes.description: Income support of ‚Çπ6,000/year for small/marginal farmers.
benefits: No land size limit for eligibility
schemes.suggestion: Check if you're eligible! üå±

schemes.name: MGNREGA
schemes.fullName: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act
schemes.description: Provides at least 100 days of wage employment per year.
benefits: Wages for work done, social security
eligibility: Adult rural household members willing to do unskilled work
schemes.suggestion: If you need work, this is a good option üí°

schemes.name: PMAY-G
schemes.description: Affordable housing for urban and rural poor.
eligibility: Families not owning a pucca house
Priority to SC/ST, minorities, and women-headed households
schemes.suggestion: You might benefit if you need housing support üè†

schemes.name: Ayushman Bharat
schemes.description: Health insurance coverage up to ‚Çπ5 lakh per family per year.
benefits: ‚Çπ5 lakh coverage per family per year
Coverage for pre and post hospitalization
eligibility: Rural families with specific deprivation criteria
schemes.suggestion: Check if your family is eligible for free healthcare üí°

schemes.name: PM Fasal Bima Yojana
schemes.description: Insurance to protect farmers against crop loss.
benefits: Low premium rates: 2% for Kharif, 1.5% for Rabi
eligibility: Both loanee and non-loanee farmers eligible
schemes.suggestion: Safeguard your crops with this scheme üå±

schemes.name: Ujjwala Yojana
schemes.description: Free LPG connections for women from BPL households.
benefits: Free LPG connection, subsidy on refill
eligibility: Women aged 18 and above from BPL families
Priority to SC/ST, PMAY, AAY families
schemes.suggestion: If you don't have LPG, this is very useful üí°

schemes.name: National Rural Livelihood Mission
schemes.fullName: Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana - National Rural Livelihoods Mission
schemes.description: Supports self-employment for rural poor.
schemes.suggestion: Could help start a small business üå±

schemes.name: Jan Dhan Yojana
schemes.description: Financial inclusion for all households.
benefits: Zero balance account, insurance, debit card
RuPay debit card with accident insurance
eligibility: All Indian citizens without a bank account
schemes.suggestion: Open a bank account if you don't have one üí°

schemes.name: Skill India
schemes.description: Upskill youth to improve employability.
schemes.suggestion: Enhance your skills for better jobs üå±

schemes.name: Atal Pension Yojana
schemes.description: Encourages savings for retirement.
eligibility: Not covered under statutory social security schemes
schemes.suggestion: Start early for a comfortable retirement üí°

schemes.name: Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana
schemes.description: Health insurance for BPL families.
benefits: Coverage up to ‚Çπ30,000 per family per year
schemes.suggestion: Enroll to protect your family from medical expenses üí°

schemes.name: Swachh Bharat Mission
schemes.description: Promotes cleanliness and sanitation across India.
eligibility: Rural households without access to toilets
schemes.suggestion: Contribute to your village or town's cleanliness üåø

schemes.name: Digital India
schemes.description: Transform India into a digitally empowered society.

schemes.name: PM Shram Yogi Maan-dhan
schemes.description: Pension for unorganized workers after 60 years.
benefits: Family pension in case of death during contribution
Government co-contribution equal to worker's contribution
schemes.suggestion: Consider this for long-term financial security üí°

schemes.name: National Scholarship Portal
schemes.description: Financial support for students from class 1 to PhD.

schemes.name: MUDRA Yojana
schemes.description: Provides loans up to ‚Çπ10 lakh to micro enterprises and small businesses.

schemes.name: Jal Jeevan Mission
schemes.fullName: Jal Jeevan Mission - Har Ghar Jal
schemes.description: Provides functional household tap connections to every rural household by 2024.
benefits: Assured water supply of 55 litres per person per day
Functional tap connection to every household
Community participation in planning and implementation
eligibility: All rural households in the country
Priority to water-stressed and drought-prone areas

schemes.name: Forest Rights Act
schemes.fullName: Scheduled Tribes and Other Traditional Forest Dwellers Act
schemes.description: Recognition of forest rights of forest dwelling Scheduled Tribes and other traditional forest dwellers.
benefits: Individual and community forest rights recognition
Right to forest produce collection and sale
eligibility: Scheduled Tribes and other traditional forest dwellers
Primarily residing in forests for livelihood
Dependent on forest for bona fide needs
schemes.suggestion: Claim your traditional forest rights üå≤

schemes.name: Van Dhan Yojana
schemes.description: Skill upgradation and capacity building program for tribal gatherers of Minor Forest Produce.
eligibility: Self Help Groups in tribal areas
Focus on Minor Forest Produce value chain

schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card
